forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mix of rain and snow showers. Low 0C.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers. Lows overnight in the low 30s.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening mixing with snow showers overnight. Low around 0C. WSW winds shifting to ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening mixing with snow showers overnight. Low 31F. WSW winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 3C. Winds ENE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 36F. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low near -5C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 22F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High near 5C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low 1C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low 32F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low around 0C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 32F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 25F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing overnight. Low around 0C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of rain and snow after midnight. Low 31F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 40F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming light freezing rain later at night. Low around 30F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and freezing rain expected...becoming light overnight. Low -2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and freezing rain...becoming light overnight. Low 28F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain tapering to showers. Areas of freezing rain early. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low 27F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some freezing drizzle early. Then a mix of wintry precipitation overnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.
